channel.title: Owl Job Scheduler on
channel.description: Recent content in Owl Job Scheduler on

item.title: About
item.description: Owl started with the need of submitting data pipelines to a Kubernetes cluster by research users, without the need to understand how Kubernetes works or indeed any programming. We built a set of parameterized pipelines that perform common tasks of data processing and analysis and just by editing a defintion file containing parameters for each each pipelines our users can run their jobs in a large cluster. A description of how Owl (and many other utilities) is used in our project is available from the IMAXT Documentation â†’
